data.name: EXPORTER_CONFIRM_GIVE_MANY
data.value: Sure![pause=0] We'll sell these items for you.

data.name: EXPORTER_CONFIRM_GIVE_ONE
data.value: Sure![pause=0] We'll sell this {0} for you.

data.name: EXPORTER_CONFIRM_TAKE
data.value: Are you sure you want to take this {0} back?[pause=0] All progress gone towards selling it will be lost.

data.name: EXPORTER_DEPOSIT
data.value: Sure thing![pause=0] What do you want to sell?

data.name: EXPORTER_DEPOSIT_DESC
data.value: Leave another item to this Exporter shop.

data.name: EXPORTER_GET_EARNINGS
data.value: We managed to sell {0} item{1} since your last visit.[pause=0] Here's your cut of the earnings.

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in exporting items!

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_2
data.value: You can leave a number of items to me,[pause=10] and i'll make sure to find a buyer for them.

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_3
data.value: More expensive items will take more time to sell than cheap ones.

data.name: EXPORTER_INFO_4
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase our stock limit and the speed at which we can sell!

data.name: EXPORTER_NO_EARNINGS
data.value: Sorry,[pause=10] we still haven't sold anything since last time.

data.name: EXPORTER_INTRO
data.value: Welcome to {0} Exports![pause=0] How can I assist you today?

data.name: MARKET_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in selling items!

data.name: MARKET_INFO_2
data.value: These items can then be brought along in adventures.

data.name: MARKET_INFO_3
data.value: If we're ever out of stock,[pause=10] we'll always have new items ready when you return from an adventure.

data.name: MARKET_INFO_4
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase the variety and amount of items we can offer!

data.name: MARKET_INTRO
data.value: Welcome to {0} Market![pause=0] Are you here to buy?

data.name: MARKET_NO_MONEY
data.value: I'm afraid you don't have the money for that!

data.name: MARKET_OUT_OF_STOCK
data.value: I'm sorry, but i'm out of stock.[pause=0] Please come back tomorrow.'

data.name: MARKET_POOL_EXPAND_DESCR
data.value: Increase the amount of slots reserved for

data.name: MARKET_POOL_TIER_DESCR
data.value: Allow the shop to sell better

data.name: MARKET_POOL_UNLOCK_DESCR
data.value: Add a new section dedicated to

data.name: MARKET_REPEAT
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: OFFICE_ACTION_CONFIRM
data.value: Perfect.[pause=0] Your changes will be visible as soon as you leave the Office.

data.name: OFFICE_BUILD_ASK
data.value: So you want to add a new {0} using {1}?

data.name: OFFICE_BUILD_SHOP
data.value: Perfect![pause=0] The new {0} should be ready by the time you leave the Office.

data.name: OFFICE_CANNOT_BUILD
data.value: Looks like we don't have enough material to build this shop.

data.name: OFFICE_CANNOT_UPGRADE
data.value: Looks like we don't have enough material to upgrade this shop.

data.name: OFFICE_INFO_4
data.value: Even this one is placeholder text.

data.name: OFFICE_RECLAIM_ASK
data.value: You have {1} {0}.[pause=0] You will need to spend {2} to reclaim this plot.[pause=0] Is that ok?

data.name: OFFICE_RECLAIM_CANNOT
data.value: Looks like we only have {1} {0}.[pause=0] That's not enough to reclaim this plot.

data.name: OFFICE_RECLAIM_ZERO
data.value: Looks like we don't have any {0}.[pause=0] We can't reclaim this plot without some.

data.name: OFFICE_UPGRADE_ASK
data.value: So you want to upgrade this {0} using {1}?

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_APPRAISAL
data.value: You can give locked boxes to this shop to open them over time.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_EXPORTER
data.value: You can give items to this shop to sell them over time. Higher prices take more time.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_MARKET
data.value: Allows you to buy various items. Its stock is refreshed every day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_TRADER
data.value: Exchanges Exclusive Items. Its stock is refreshed every day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_BUILD_MULTI_CHOICE
data.value: The cost for building this shop depends on what option you will choose in the next menu.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_BASE
data.value: Can hold {0} items. Gains {1} progress per day.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_BOOST
data.value: All items require slightly less progress to be sold.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_DEPOSIT
data.value: Deposits all new earnings in the town bank.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_EXPORTER_INSTANT
data.value: Has a 25% chance to instantly sell an item.\n

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_LOCKED
data.value: A plot of land overrun with greenery. It needs to be reclaimed using some {0} before it can house a building.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_OUT_OF_LIMIT
data.value: [color=#FF0000]To reclaim this plot you must first upgrade the {0} to level {1}.[color]

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_TUTOR_BASE
data.value: Teaches level moves up to level {0}.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_UNLOCKED
data.value: A clear plot of land that is ready to house a new building.

data.name: PLOT_DESCRIPTION_UPGRADE_MULTI_CHOICE
data.value: The cost of this upgrade depends on what option you will choose in the next menu.\n

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_BUILDINGS
data.value: Unlock plots of land, build and upgrade shops to grow the {0}.

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_RENAME
data.value: Change the name of the town.

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_RENAME_FINAL
data.value: Change the name of the town. You can also remove the word "{0}" from its full name if you want.

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_UPGRADE
data.value: Upgrade the town using {0} from your Storage.

data.name: TOWN_MANAGER_DESCR_UPGRADE_LOCKED
data.value: [color=#FF0000]You must have at least one shop at level {0} to do this![color]

data.name: TUTOR_FORGET_WHO
data.value: Who wants to forget a move?

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_1
data.value: This shop specializes in teaching and removing moves.

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_2
data.value: We can teach a Pokémon any move it would learn up to a certain level.[pause=0] A move's price scales with the level.

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_3
data.value: We can also help Pokémon forget moves,[pause=10] free of charge!

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_4
data.value: Careful,[pause=10] though:[pause=20] if you forget a TM,[pause=10] you won't be able to learn it again here.

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_5
data.value: We can also teach {0} moves! Our stock changes from time to time, so come back frequently to check it out!

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_6
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase our level limit!

data.name: TUTOR_INFO_6b
data.value: Make sure to invest in our shop to increase our level limit and the amount of {0} moves we can offer!

data.name: TUTOR_INTRO
data.value: This is {0} Tutor Services![pause=0] Are you ready to learn?

data.name: TUTOR_LEARN_WHO
data.value: Who wants to learn a new move?

data.name: TUTOR_REPLACE
data.value: We'll need to replace a move.[pause=0] What'll it be?

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_EXPAND_DESCR
data.value: Increase the number of slots reserved for items of a specific kind by 1.\n

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_SPECIALIZE_DESCR
data.value: Give a section of the shop a daily chance of having one of its items on sale.\n

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_TIER_DESCR
data.value: Allow the shop to sell more powerful items of a specific kind.\n

data.name: UPGRADE_MARKET_UNLOCK_DESCR
data.value: Add another section to the shop, allowing it to sell new kinds of items.\n
